tasks.task: Construct a fully automatic crop farming system using the Gantry Carriage System in Minecraft.
subtasks: Position the Gantry Carriage at one end of the Gantry Shaft.
Attach Linear Chassis to the Gantry Carriage.
Place harvesters on both sides of the Linear Chassis.
Install redstone contacts at each end of the Gantry Carriage.
Connect redstone links to the redstone contacts.
Set up storage for crop output.
Create a portable storage interface for output.
Configure redstone receivers to detect harvester arrival.
Arrange toggle latch to reverse Gantry Shaft rotation.
Arrange gear shift to control machine movement.
Implement an off switch with a sticky piston and lever.
Customize redstone link frequency to prevent interference.
Set up a funnel and chest for crop unloading.
Ensure starting plants are positioned beyond the machine's travel range.

tasks.task: Explain the operation of the Gantry Carriage System.
subtasks: Describe how the machine uses redstone signals to toggle the gear shift.
Clarify the direction movement based on Gantry Shaft rotation.
Explain the role of the rotation speed in the machine's performance.
Mention the use of a water wheel's RPM as a variable.
